00035 #include <dcblock.h>
00036 
00037 // NB may have to ramify this a little
00038 // for other sampling rates; maybe not  
00039 
00040 PRIVATE REAL butterworth_hipass_100_2( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv ),
00041         butterworth_hipass_100_4( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv ),
00042         butterworth_hipass_100_6( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv ),
00043         butterworth_hipass_100_8( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv );
00044 
00045 void DCBlock( DCBlocker dcb )
00046 {
00047     int i;
00048     REAL x,
00049          y;
00050 
00051     switch ( dcb->lev )
00052     {
00053 
00054     case DCB_LOW:
00055         for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( dcb->buf ); i++ )
00056         {
00057             x = CXBreal( dcb->buf, i );
00058             y = butterworth_hipass_100_2( x, dcb->old.inp, dcb->old.out );
00059             CXBdata( dcb->buf, i ) = Cmplx( y, 0.0 );
00060         }
00061         break;
00062 
00063     case DCB_MED:
00064         for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( dcb->buf ); i++ )
00065         {
00066             x = CXBreal( dcb->buf, i );
00067             y = butterworth_hipass_100_4( x, dcb->old.inp, dcb->old.out );
00068             CXBdata( dcb->buf, i ) = Cmplx( y, 0.0 );
00069         }
00070         break;
00071 
00072     case DCB_HIGH:
00073         for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( dcb->buf ); i++ )
00074         {
00075             x = CXBreal( dcb->buf, i );
00076             y = butterworth_hipass_100_6( x, dcb->old.inp, dcb->old.out );
00077             CXBdata( dcb->buf, i ) = Cmplx( y, 0.0 );
00078         }
00079         break;
00080 
00081     case DCB_SUPER:
00082         for ( i = 0; i < CXBsize( dcb->buf ); i++ )
00083         {
00084             x = CXBreal( dcb->buf, i );
00085             y = butterworth_hipass_100_8( x, dcb->old.inp, dcb->old.out );
00086             CXBdata( dcb->buf, i ) = Cmplx( y, 0.0 );
00087         }
00088         break;
00089 
00090     default:
00091         break;
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void resetDCBlocker( DCBlocker dcb, int lev )
00096 {
00097     memset( ( char * ) dcb->old.inp, 0, BLKMEM * sizeof( REAL ) );
00098     memset( ( char * ) dcb->old.out, 0, BLKMEM * sizeof( REAL ) );
00099     dcb->lev = lev;
00100 }
00101 
00102 DCBlocker newDCBlocker( int lev, CXB buf )
00103 {
00104     DCBlocker dcb =
00105         ( DCBlocker ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( DCBlockerInfo ), "DCBlocker" );
00106     dcb->buf = newCXB( CXBsize( buf ), CXBbase( buf ), "DCBlocker" );
00107     dcb->lev = lev;
00108     return dcb;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void delDCBlocker( DCBlocker dcb )
00112 {
00113     if ( dcb )
00114     {
00115         delCXB( dcb->buf );
00116         safefree( ( char * ) dcb );
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 // f == 0.002083 == 100 Hz at 48k
00121 
00122 PRIVATE REAL butterworth_hipass_100_2( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv )
00123 {
00124     int i;
00125 
00126     for ( i = 1; i < 2; i++ )
00127         xv[i - 1] = xv[i], yv[i - 1] = yv[i];
00128 
00129     xv[2] = ( REAL ) ( xin / 1.009297482 );
00130 
00131     yv[2] =
00132         ( REAL ) ( ( xv[0] + xv[2] ) + -2.0 * xv[1] + -0.9816611902 * yv[0] +
00133                    1.9814914708 * yv[1] );
00134 
00135     return yv[2];
00136 }
00137 
00138 PRIVATE REAL butterworth_hipass_100_4( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv )
00139 {
00140     int i;
00141 
00142     for ( i = 1; i < 4; i++ )
00143         xv[i - 1] = xv[i], yv[i - 1] = yv[i];
00144 
00145     xv[4] = ( REAL ) ( xin / 1.012 );
00146 
00147     yv[4] =
00148         ( REAL ) ( ( xv[0] + xv[4] ) + -4.0 * ( xv[1] + xv[3] ) +
00149                    6.0 * xv[2] + -0.976340271 * yv[0] + 3.928738552 * yv[1] +
00150                    -5.928454312 * yv[2] + 3.976056024 * yv[3] );
00151 
00152     return yv[4];
00153 }
00154 
00155 PRIVATE REAL butterworth_hipass_100_6( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv )
00156 {
00157     int i;
00158 
00159     for ( i = 1; i < 6; i++ )
00160         xv[i - 1] = xv[i], yv[i - 1] = yv[i];
00161 
00162     xv[6] = ( REAL ) ( xin / 1.025606415 );
00163 
00164     yv[6] =
00165         ( REAL ) ( ( xv[0] + xv[6] ) + -6.0 * ( xv[1] + xv[5] ) +
00166                    15.0 * ( xv[2] + xv[4] ) + -20.0 * xv[3] +
00167                    -0.9506891622 * yv[0] + 5.7522090378 * yv[1] +
00168                    -14.5019247580 * yv[2] + 19.4994114580 * yv[3] +
00169                    -14.7484389800 * yv[4] + 5.9494324049 * yv[5] );
00170 
00171     return yv[6];
00172 }
00173 
00174 PRIVATE REAL butterworth_hipass_100_8( REAL xin, REAL * xv, REAL * yv )
00175 {
00176     int i;
00177 
00178     for ( i = 1; i < 8; i++ )
00179         xv[i - 1] = xv[i], yv[i - 1] = yv[i];
00180 
00181     xv[8] = ( REAL ) ( xin / 1.034112352 );
00182 
00183     yv[8] =
00184         ( REAL ) ( ( xv[0] + xv[8] ) + -8.0 * ( xv[1] + xv[7] ) +
00185                    28.0 * ( xv[2] + xv[6] ) + -56.0 * ( xv[3] + xv[5] ) +
00186                    70.0 * xv[4] + -0.9351139781 * yv[0] +
00187                    7.5436450525 * yv[1] + -26.6244301320 * yv[2] +
00188                    53.6964633920 * yv[3] + -67.6854640540 * yv[4] +
00189                    54.6046308830 * yv[5] + -27.5326449810 * yv[6] +
00190                    7.9329138172 * yv[7] );
00191 
00192     return yv[8];
00193 }
